ygData.subject: Re: Guild thingy
ygData.msgSnippet: OK... Garren come back... we need u to tank... kekkee... NOW SEREPH TAKE THE BLOODY JOB!!! Nic p/s: hands up everyone! ... From: Gary Qui Hong Loong
ygData.messageBody:
OK... Garren come back... we need u to tank... kekkee... NOW SEREPH TAKE THE
BLOODY JOB!!!

Nic
p/s: hands up everyone!
----- Original Message -----
From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 6:56 PM
Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guild thingy


> From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
>
> no thx. muhahah. at most I go guildless. muhahah
>
> "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" wrote:
>
> > From: "Cheng Shan Chieh, Freddy" <sccheng@...>
> >
> > ok... i figured that the guildmaster is just a name... y not garren take
> > it... but its always the council that decides what to do n what not? how
> > bout that? Garren TAKE THE BLOODY JOB !! cant think of anyone more free
than
> > u... kekeke...
> >
> > Nic
> > ----- Original Message -----
> > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > To: <sg-everquest@onelist.com>
> > Sent: Tuesday, August 17, 1999 6:37 PM
> > Subject: Re: [sg-everquest] Guild thingy
> >
> > > From: Gary Qui Hong Loong <kanglun@...>
> > >
> > > Ahahahh. thx but no thx.
> > >
> > > LKW wrote:
> > >
> > > > From: LKW <leekw13@...>
> > > >
> > > > I think for all kakis to enjoy this game, lvl different shldn't be
too
> > big. So, take a look ard u, who the following characterics:
> > > >
> > > > - Highest lvl goon (time for him to slow down a bit to let other
gain
> > lvl)
> > > > - Can play during work (can perform his GM duties even when working)
> > > > - Can play long hr (can organise activities and perform guild
duties)
> > > > - No life (self-explanatory)
> > > >
> > > > Anyone with the a/m elements (other than the last points, where most
> > kakis posses) will get my nomination ;)
> > > >
> > > > On Tuesday, 17 August, 1999 5:09 PM, Sereph
> > [SMTP:garford@...] wrote:
> > > > > From: Sereph <garford@...>
> > > > >
> > > > > After all the messages about cmaping, SM nuking etc...... You are
> > still
> > > > > have not vote for a goon to lead the guild leh......
> > > > >
> > > > > If no ones starts to saboh, one of the officers will be forced to
be
> > > > > promoted to guildmaster.
> > > > >
